item.title: 2021 Week 8 (~2021-02-22)
item.description:
This is a best-effort based Japanese editoon. See English edition for the full updates.

注目のリリース

Kubernetes Engine

Multi Cluster Service

  • Discover and invoke services across clusters with GKE multi-cluster services. (February 17, 2021)

  • Multi-cluster Services (MCS) is now Generally Available (GA) for GKE versions 1.17 and later. MCS provides a Kubernetes-native interface to build Kubernetes applications that span multiple clusters. MCS enables existing Services to be discoverable and accessible across clusters with a virtual IP, matching the behavior of a ClusterIP Service accessible in a cluster. (February 17, 2021, GKE Release notes)

Docs

  • Concepts: Multi-cluster Services
  • Configuring: Configuring multi-cluster Services
    • See Also: Setting up Multi-cluster Ingress

Compute Engine

  • Preview: Predictive autoscaling for managed instance groups lets you improve the availability of your workloads by using Machine Learning to predict future demand and create virtual machines ahead of forecasted load.(February 17, 2021)
    • Docs: Using predictive autoscaling

BigQuery

  • BigQuery now supports exporting table data in Parquet format. This feature is in Preview. For more information, see Parquet export details.(February 16, 2021)
    • Docs: Parquet export details

Google Cloud Armor

  • Google Cloud Armor Adaptive Protection is available in Public Preview. Adaptive Protection builds machine-learning models that help you protect your Google Cloud applications, websites, and services against L7 distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks.(February 19, 2021)
    • Docs: Google Cloud Armor Adaptive Protection overview

IAM

  • You can now use IAM conditions to set limits on the roles that a member can grant and revoke. This feature is generally available.(February 16, 2021)
    • Docs: Setting limits on granting roles

ブログなど

  • The life-changing magic of making with ML, February 18, 2021
  • Ship your Go applications faster to Cloud Run with ko, February 17, 2021
  • Building container images in Go, February 03, 2021
  • Cloud Run: Using WebSockets - Best Practices
    • https://twitter.com/ahmetb/status/1362876986473943051

その他のリリース

  • Introducing Django ORM Support for Cloud Spanner, February 17, 2021
  • Service Directory is generally available: Simplify your service inventory, February 17, 2021
  • Managing response policies and rules in Cloud DNS is available in Beta, February 16, 2021
  • Preview release of Ingress and egress rules for VPC Service Controls., February 16, 2021

item.title: 2021 Week 5 (~2021-02-01)
item.description:
きになり！

Cloud Run (fully managed)

  • Cloud Run now supports WebSockets, HTTP/2 and gRPC streaming. (January 20, 2021)
    • Status: Preivew
    • Docs
      • Invoking with WebSockets
      • Using HTTP/2
      • Using gRPC
    • Posts
      • Official: Introducing WebSockets, HTTP/2 and gRPC bidirectional streams for Cloud Run

Secret Manager

  • Secret Manager Expiration is available for all customers via public preview.(January 28, 2021)
    • Status: Preview
    • Docs
      • Official: Creating and Managing Expiring Secrets

Cloud SQL

  • Query Insights is now generally available. Query Insights helps you detect, diagnose, and prevent query performance problems for Cloud SQL databases. It provides self-service, intuitive monitoring, and diagnostic information that goes beyond detection to help you to identify the root cause of performance problems. (January 28, 2021)

    • Status: GA
    • Docs
      • Overview of Query Insights
